track.Title: Shattered Frames
track.Label: Bhadz / Skye / SKYE Records
track.Lyrics: [ti:Shattered Frames] / [ar:Bhadz] / [al:Shattered Frames] / [re:Created by Bhadz][ve:1] / / [length:03:03.830] / [00:05.287]Your words cut deep like jagged glass / [00:08.276]Left me bleeding on the floor don't ask / [00:11.484]I built a bridge from broken bones / [00:14.480]You lit a match now it's ashes stones / [00:18.210]Do you see it / [00:21.446]Do you feel it / [00:24.571]The wreckage in my chest / [00:29.545]Shattered Frames, all that's left of us / [00:33.925]Memories crumbling to dust / [00:41.931]Shattered Frames, hanging on my wall / [00:46.167]Prove that we were nothing at all / [00:57.541]The echoes scream inside my head / [01:00.613]Your voice still wakes the living dead / [01:03.666]Every promise was a loaded gun / [01:06.202]You pulled the trigger, thought it'd be fun / [01:09.685]Screaming out, I don't need you / [01:12.759]Burning down, I won't be you / [01:15.725]Every lie you told, I swallowed whole / [01:18.283]But now I'm spitting back the soul / [01:22.042]Shattered Frames, all that's left of us / [01:26.175]Memories crumbling to dust / [01:34.126]Shattered Frames, hanging on my wall / [01:38.504]Prove that we were nothing at all / [01:41.522]Though its nothing were nothing at all / [02:08.192]The echoes scream inside my head / [02:11.382]Your voice still wakes the living dead / [02:14.592]Every promise was a loaded gun / [02:16.991]You pulled the trigger, thought it'd be fun / [02:20.229]Screaming out, I don't need you / [02:23.313]Burning down, I won't be you / [02:26.488]Every lie you told, I swallowed whole / [02:29.110]But now I'm spitting back the soul / [02:32.871]Shattered Frames, all that's left of us / [02:36.997]Memories crumbling to dust / [02:45.002]Shattered Frames, hanging on my wall / [02:49.292]Prove that we were nothing at all / [02:52.247]Though its nothing were nothing at all

extra.LABEL: Bhadz / Skye / SKYE Records / Bhadz / Skye / SKYE Records
